<article about="/articles/20141211/1639/new-friends-face-potluck-game-night" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-1639">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20141211/1639/new-friends-face-potluck-game-night" title="New friends face off at Potluck Game Night">New friends face off at Potluck Game Night</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="New friends face off at Potluck Game Night" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-66cc3673-3ac9-6299-7486-958915c86694">It’s 9 pm on a Saturday and the cavernous Urf Memorial Hall swells with patrons as Potluck Game Night climbs towards critical mass: the tipping point where “tabletop space” suddenly</span>...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20141211/1639/new-friends-face-potluck-game-night" rel="tag" title="New friends face off at Potluck Game Night">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about New friends face off at Potluck Game Night</span></a></li></ul></nav>

<article about="/articles/20131107/983/riots-making-move" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sschutz even clearfix" id="node-article-983">

As we’ve grown, we’ve squeezed ourselves into every cranny and we’ve spread across multiple floors...</p></div></div></div>  </div>

                Facebook.com

r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><a href="http://sportv.globo.com" class="logo-produto icon-produto"><span class="logo-produto-container">sportv</span></a><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><div class='logo-area item-editoria tamanho-titulo-normal '><a OAS_AD("Right")</script><div id="banner_insert" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="opec-mobile-topo" class="opec-area OAS_MOBILE("x60")</script></div></div></header><script>
      window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script></div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking destaque-box-destaque-principal-fotao-fotinha tipo-fotao glb-hl-style-fotao-base-esquerdo"><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/e-gol/noticia/2017/03/enercino-do-inter-de-lages-tem-belo-gol-eleito-como-pintura-da-rodada.html"

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/e-gol/noticia/2017/03/rene-juninho-enercino-kozlowski-e-everton-disputam-pintura-da-rodada.html" title="Renê, Juninho, Enercino, Kozlowski e Éverton disputam pintura da rodada" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title" data-href="https://glo.bo/2nHM69M" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/lXZ0tEEAene-veaqk6o_jgQd1mw=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/22/rene.jpg">

                </svg>
            </a>
            <div class="menu-carousel-link-shadow"></div>
        </li>
        {{/portals}}
    </ul>
</div>
<div id="menu-carousel-body" class="menu-carousel menu-carousel-body swiper-container">
    <ul class="menu-brands swiper-wrapper">
        {{#portals}}
        <li data-produto="{{name}}" class="menu-carousel-item menu-carousel-{{name}} {{#active}}menu-carousel-item-active{{/active}} swiper-slide">
            <div id="menu-rounder" class="menu-rounder">{{{menu}}}</div>
        </li>
        {{/portals}}
    </ul>
</div>

</script>

<script id="menu-rounder-template" type="x-tmpl-mustache">

  <div id="menu-cascade" class="menu-cascade" data-menu-index="{{index}}">
    <ul class="menu-root menu-level menu-level-0">{{#items}}{{>recursive_partial}}{{/items}}</ul>
  </div>
  <div id="menu-addon" class="menu-addon"></div>

</script>

<script id="menu-custom-template" type="x-tmpl-mustache">

    {{#items}}{{>recursive_partial}}{{/items}}

</script>


<script id="menu-dinamico-template" type="x-tmpl-mustache">

<li id="menu-{{deepness}}-{{tituloSlug}}" class="menu-item {{#separador}} menu-item-separator{{/separador}}{{#destacado}} menu-item-highlighted{{/destacado}}{{#agrupador}} menu-item-grouped{{/agrupador}}{{#hasChildren}} is-father{{/hasChildren}}{{#hasSubmenuBroken}} menu-item-submenu-broken{{/hasSubmenuBroken}}">

    {{#shouldBeLink}}<a href="{{link}}" class="menu-item-link">{{/shouldBeLink}}
    {{^shouldBeLink}}<span class="menu-item-link">{{/shouldBeLink}}
        <span class="menu-item-title">{{titulo}}<span class="menu-item-arrow"><svg class="regua-navegacao-icon"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#regua-arrow"></use></svg></span></span>
    {{#shouldBeLink}}</a>{{/shouldBeLink}}
    {{^shouldBeLink}}</span>{{/shouldBeLink}}

    {{#hasChildren}}
        <div class="menu-level menu-submenu menu-submenu-level{{deepness}}{{#hasSubmenuBroken}} menu-item-submenu-broken{{/hasSubmenuBroken}} menu-submenu-column-1">
            <a class="menu-submenu-title menu-item-back"><span class="menu-item-arrow"><svg class="regua-navegacao-icon"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#regua-arrow"></use></svg></span><span class="regua-navegacao-menu-item">{{titulo}}</span></a>
            <ul class="menu-submenu-vertical-scroll">
            {{#children}}
                {{>recursive_partial}}
            {{/children}}
            <ul>
        </div>
    {{/hasChildren}}
</li>

</script>

<div id="blog-corpo">	
	<div id="content" class="narrowcolumn">
			
			<div class="post" id="post-916">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/12/09/neymar-parabeniza-falcao-por-titulo-da-liga-futsal-e-manda-recado-sou-seu-fa/" rel="bookmark" class="icone gm marcelo" title="Link Permanente para Neymar parabeniza Falcão por título da Liga Futsal e manda recado: &#8220;Sou seu fã&#8221;">Neymar parabeniza Falcão por título da Liga Futsal e manda recado: &#8220;Sou seu fã&#8221;</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">ter, 09/12/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por gm marcelo |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Falcão fez história nesta última segunda-feira ao conquistar com o Sorocaba seu nono título da Liga Futsal, depois de 11 finais na competição, dez delas de forma consecutiva. Nesta terça, um dos principais parabéns veio direto de Barcelona. O craque Neymar, do clube catalão e da seleção brasileira, postou um dos gols do camisa 12 numa rede social e escreveu: &#8220;Parabéns meu craque .. Mas um título de muitos que você já tem !! Sou seu fã .. Tamo junto fenomenooooo&#8221;.</p>
<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned data-instgrm-version="4" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;">
<div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;">
<div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div>
</div>
<p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://instagram.com/p/wZXwmwRtsw/" onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outbound/article/instagram.com');" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_top">Parabéns meu craque .. Mas um título de muitos que você já tem !! Sou seu fã .. Tamo junto fenomenooooo</a></p>
<p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">Video zveejnné uživatelem Nj (@neymarjr), <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2014-12-09T18:42:34+00:00">Pro 12, 2014 at 10:42 PST</time></p>
</div>
</blockquote>
<p><script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-915">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/08/28/fiba-lanca-video-musical-do-mundial-de-basquete-com-brasileiros-em-destaque/" rel="bookmark" class="icone gm marcelo" title="Link Permanente para Fiba lança vídeo musical do Mundial de basquete com brasileiros em destaque">Fiba lança vídeo musical do Mundial de basquete com brasileiros em destaque</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">qui, 28/08/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por gm marcelo |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Ao som da música “Sube La Copa”, na voz do cantor espanhol Huecco, a Federação Internacional de Basquete (Fiba) lançou nesta quinta-feira a música oficial do Mundial de Basquete, que acontece na Espanha. Intercalados com imagens do cantor, os jogadores que estarão na competição que começa neste sábado protagonizam o vídeo, com destaque para cinco brasileiros: Rafael Hettsheimer, Marcelinho Huertas, Alex e o americano naturalizado Larry Taylor, que erguem a “taça” Raulzinho, e ainda uma torcedora de verde e amarelo com a bandeira do Brasil. Confira abaixo o clipe completo:</p>
<p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" data="http://www.youtube.com/v/Wd9Xw5PSPGo" width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Wd9Xw5PSPGo" /></object></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-913">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/08/23/brasileiro-idolo-do-sumo-sofre-com-o-desafio-do-gelo/" rel="bookmark" class="icone gm marcelo" title="Link Permanente para Brasileiro ídolo do sumô sofre com o desafio do gelo">Brasileiro ídolo do sumô sofre com o desafio do gelo</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">sáb, 23/08/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por gm marcelo |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			<div class="post" id="post-857">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/08/07/em-jacuzzi-bolt-estrela-comercial-com-encrenqueiros-balotelli-e-marta/" rel="bookmark" class="icone raphael" title="Link Permanente para Em jacuzzi, Bolt estrela comercial com &#8220;encrenqueiros&#8221; Balotelli e Marta">Em jacuzzi, Bolt estrela comercial com &#8220;encrenqueiros&#8221; Balotelli e Marta</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">qui, 07/08/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por raphael |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>O jamaicano Usain Bolt fez um chamado aos encrenqueiros. Em uma jacuzzi e cercado por belas mulheres, a lenda viva do atletismo, como ele mesmo gosta de falar, estrelou um comercial da Puma, que faz parte da campanha #ForeverFast (sempre rápido). O vídeo ainda conta com astros do futebol: o italiano Mario Balotelli, a brasileira Marta e o argentino Sergio Agüero. Os jogadores de golfe Rickie Fowler e Lexi Thompson também participam da ação.</p>
<p>No vídeo, Bolt pede para que os encrenqueiros sigam seus instintos, porque sempre são os mais rápidos e encerra o vídeo fugindo de um cachorro. Na campanha, as estrelas desencorajam a obediência e exaltam ambição, hostilidade e animosidade.</p>
<p>- Sempre fomos conhecidos por ser uma marca que assume riscos e isso não mudará. Forever Fast claramente representa isso &#8211; disse Adam Petrick diretor global de marketing da Puma.</p>
<p><iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/LUZ5m_402MU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-843">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/08/07/mulher-da-banho-em-mayweather/" rel="bookmark" class="icone raphael" title="Link Permanente para Mulher dá banho em Mayweather">Mulher dá banho em Mayweather</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">qui, 07/08/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por raphael |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>A preparação de Floyd Mayweather para enfrentar Marcos Maidana começa bem antes dos treinos. Em vídeo publicado em sua conta no Instagram, o pugilista mostra uma mulher ensaboando suas costas enquanto ele escova os dentes dentro de uma banheira.</p>
<p>- É assim que meu dia começa, todos os dias &#8211; escreveu.</p>
<p><iframe src="//instagram.com/p/rYn1vXx3QB/embed/" width="612" height="710" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true"></iframe></p>
</div>

			<div class="post" id="post-855">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/08/06/video-mostra-semelhanca-entre-kobe-bryant-e-michael-jordan/" rel="bookmark" class="icone raphael" title="Link Permanente para Vídeos mostram semelhança entre Kobe Bryant e Michael Jordan">Vídeos mostram semelhança entre Kobe Bryant e Michael Jordan</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">qua, 06/08/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por raphael |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/basquete/" title="Ver todos os posts em Basquete" rel="category tag">Basquete</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Viciado em basquete, o jovem Youssef Hannoun gosta de publicar a cada ano vídeos mostrando a impressionante semelhança das jogadas de Kobe Bryant e Michael Jordan, dois dos maiores jogadores de basquete de todos os tempos. Em 2012, o primeiro vídeo rendeu quase 4 milhões de visualizações. A incrível edição mostra as duas feras com os mesmos movimentos, golpes e atitude dentro de quadra. Um ano depois, um outro vídeo teve 2,2 milhões de cliques. O terceiro veio na noite desta terça-feira, e já foi visto por mais de 300 mil pessoas até o momento. Confira:</p>
<p>Parte 1 &#8211; 2012:<br />
<iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/v27Hk5OIe-k?list=UUgkSTQ-itRJ9Hm-PVUgPEyw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
<p>Parte 2 &#8211; 2013:<br />
<iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/C5tagtU4AV8?list=UUgkSTQ-itRJ9Hm-PVUgPEyw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
<p>Parte 3 &#8211; 2014<br />
<iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/JnB9bvud6IU?list=UUgkSTQ-itRJ9Hm-PVUgPEyw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-849">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/07/29/em-video-mayweather-canta-parabens-para-a-namorada/" rel="bookmark" class="icone fabio.fausto" title="Link Permanente para Desafinado, Floyd Mayweather canta parabéns para a namorada em vídeo">Desafinado, Floyd Mayweather canta parabéns para a namorada em vídeo</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">ter, 29/07/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por fabio.fausto |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Atleta mais bem pago mundo, o boxeador Floyd &#8220;Money&#8221; Mayweather Jr. <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/boxe/noticia/2014/07/mayweather-posta-video-apaixonado-para-namorada-presente-de-deus.html#atleta-mayweather" >usou as redes sociais para parabenizar a namorada Doralie Medina no domingo</a>, postando um vídeo com uma montagem de fotos e se declarando para a amada. Nesta terça, a moça mostrou que a homenagem não parou por aí. Em imagens postadas por ela em sua conta em uma rede social, o maior pugilista peso por peso da atualidade aparece cantando &#8220;Parabéns a você&#8221; em inglês. Se sobra talento nos ringues, falta afinação ao lutador invicto na hora de cantar <em>(veja o vídeo abaixo)</em>.</p>
<p><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/MAY.jpg"  rel="lightbox[849]"><img src="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/MAY.jpg" alt="MAY" width="690" height="588" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-851" /></a></p>
<p>Doralie, que está sentada à mesa recheada de guloseimas, fica sem graça com a homenagem do animado Mayweather. A loira ainda publicou uma seleção de imagens feitas na sua festa de aniversário de 30 anos. Em uma delas, o pugilista de 37 anos dá uma coleção de relógios de presente. </p>
<p>- Só rindo &#8211; comenta a moça na legenda da imagem.</p>
<p><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/MAY-2.jpg"  rel="lightbox[849]"><img src="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/MAY-2.jpg" alt="MAY 2" width="691" height="691" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-852" /></a></p>
<p>A última luta de Mayweather foi contra Marcos Maidana, da Argentina, em maio. Ele aceitou o pedido de revanche e voltará a enfrentá-lo no dia 13 de setembro, em Las Vegas. O atleta tem 46 vitórias em 46 confrontos e já nocauteou 26 rivais.</p>
<p><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/bad.jpg"  rel="lightbox[849]"><img src="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/bad.jpg" alt="bad" width="690" height="690" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-853" /></a></p>
<p><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/bad-3.jpg"  rel="lightbox[849]"><img src="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/bad-3.jpg" alt="bad 3" width="691" height="460" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-854" /></a></p>
<p><strong>Confira abaixo o vídeo com Mayweather cantando &#8220;Parabéns a você&#8221; em inglês:</strong></p>
<p><iframe src="//instagram.com/p/rBuA1yEqN-/embed/" width="612" height="710" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true"></iframe></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-846">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/07/19/namorada-de-mayweather-mostra-fisico-do-boxeador-em-sessao-de-fotos/" rel="bookmark" class="icone fabio.fausto" title="Link Permanente para Em vídeo, namorada de Mayweather mostra físico do boxeador e tira onda">Em vídeo, namorada de Mayweather mostra físico do boxeador e tira onda</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">sáb, 19/07/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por fabio.fausto |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Namorada de Floyd &#8220;Money&#8221; Mayweather Jr., Doralie Medina publicou um vídeo <em>(veja no fim da reportagem)</em> feito em uma sessão de fotos da qual participa o boxeador. Ela se mostrou impressionada com o físico do atleta mais bem pago do mundo com apenas dois dias de treinamento para o confronto contra o argentino Marcos Maidana, contra quem venceu seu último duelo. A revanche acontecerá no dia 13 de setembro.</p>
<p>- Somente dois dias de treinamento (e já dessa maneira)&#8230; HARD WORK?!???? &#8211; perguntou a moça, fazendo uma referência ao slogan do lutador &#8220;Money, hard work, dedication&#8221; (do inglês, &#8220;Dinheiro, trabalho duro, dedicação&#8221;).</p>
<p><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/money.jpg"  rel="lightbox[846]"><img src="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/files/1178/2014/07/money.jpg" alt="money" width="690" height="679" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-848" /></a></p>
<p>A dois meses do segundo combate entre os Mayweather e Maidana, os dois vivem clima de muita rivalidade. <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/boxe/noticia/2014/07/esquentou-mayweather-e-rival-trocam-empurroes-apos-coletiva-de-imprensa.html#atleta-mayweather" >A maior tensão foi registrada em uma das coletivas de imprensa de divulgação do evento</a>, na cidade de San Antonio. No momento da tradicional &#8221;encarada&#8221; entre os lutadores, Mayweather se aproximou muito do adversário argentino e acabou sendo empurrado. O americano chegou a revidar, mas foi rapidamente contido. Os dois voltaram a se estranhar no fim do encontro.</p>
<p><iframe src="//instagram.com/p/qpHNF2EqJg/embed/" width="612" height="710" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true"></iframe></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

		
			<div class="post" id="post-845">
				<h2><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/2014/07/18/anastasia-ashley-faz-sucesso-em-campanha-de-moda/" rel="bookmark" class="icone raphael" title="Link Permanente para Rainha das &#8220;selfies&#8221;, Anastasia Ashley faz sucesso em campanha de moda">Rainha das &#8220;selfies&#8221;, Anastasia Ashley faz sucesso em campanha de moda</a></h2>
			<p>
				<small>
					<div class="time">sex, 18/07/14</div>
					<div class="auto">por raphael |</div>
					<div class="cate">categoria <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/category/sem-categoria/" title="Ver todos os posts em Sem categoria" rel="category tag">Sem categoria</a></div>
					<div class="tags2"></div>
				</small>
			</p>

			
			<div class="entry"><p>Musa do surfe, Anastasia Ashley esbanjou charme e beleza em uma campanha de moda para a loja &#8220;Revolveclothing.com&#8221;. Confira o resultado do trabalho: </p>
<p><iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/DfwhpRJSbg8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe></p>
</div>

			<p class="postmetadata"> <span>Comentários desativados</span></p>
			</div>

    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Rioters Rendezvous at MIGS14</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20141108/1612/rioters-rendezvous-migs14" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-1612">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Rioters Rendezvous at MIGS14" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 11-08-14</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20141108/1612/rioters-rendezvous-migs14">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20141108/1612/rioters-rendezvous-migs14">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/MIGS14Main.jpg?itok=VX6lRLj9" width="700" height="300" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">This year we&rsquo;re splashing the colorful </span><a href="http://www.migs14.com/faq/" target="_blank">Palais des congr&egrave;s</a> with a little Riot red at the annual Montreal International Games Summit. On November 10th and 11th, Rioters will join a slew of industry pros and enthusiasts from Quebec and beyond to mingle and <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DC8yx4BxEg&amp;feature=youtu.be&amp;t=37s" target="_blank">meld minds</a>. Between swapping stories and sharing insights about everything that goes into gaming development, we&rsquo;ll kick things off with the MIGS14 <a href="http://www.migs14.com/brandon-beck-ceo-de-riot-games-parlera-de-talent-et-de-culture-au-migs14/" target="_blank">keynote speech</a> and a couple other sessions on why we work the way we do. &nbsp;</p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Keynote Speech </span>- Monday 11/10 10:00 - 11:00am, Room 520</li>
</ul>
<p dir="ltr" style="margin-left:36pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">CEO and co-founder Brandon Beck will talk talent and culture at Riot and discuss the way people and teams can come together to make games.</span></p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Art with a Purpose: Evolution of Art at Riot Games </span>- Monday 11/10 5:15 - 6:15pm, Room 520A</li>
</ul>
<p dir="ltr" style="margin-left:36pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Laura DeYoung, Peet Cooper, and Moby Francke will break down the artistic process at Riot and our philosophy that art should serve to enhance gameplay and strengthen fantasy. Creating innovative new champs, reimagining aged classics, discovering Shurima, and updating Summoner&rsquo;s Rift &mdash; it&rsquo;s all covered in this panel on art with a purpose.</span></p>
<ul dir="ltr">
	<li>
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Service Modularity, Latency, and Caching in the <em>League of Legends</em> Platform (AKA Getting the Balance Right) </span>&nbsp;- Tuesday 11/11 4:00 - 5:00pm, Room 520B</li>
</ul>
<p dir="ltr" style="margin-left:36pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Andrew McVeigh will explain the strategies and techniques it takes to keep up with a rapidly growing game like </span><em>League of Legends</em>. Running smoothly ain&rsquo;t easy when we constantly add new features and game modes, but more services shouldn&rsquo;t mean more lag for players. This talk will highlight the architectural solutions that help us get the balance right.</p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c8b8ec3-9277-1bea-0795-4c6205213fb6">Need more MIGS? Explore the rest of the summit </span><a href="http://www.migs14.com/conferences/" target="_blank">here.</a></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/categories/category-b" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">League of Legends</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/categories/category" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a></div></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>
    
		<a href="/news" class="view-all">All Articles</a>
      </div>
</article>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>

<script type="text/javascript">

  _gaq.push(['_require', 'inpage_linkid', pluginUrl]);_gaq.push(["_trackPageview"]);//TRACK APPLY LINKS ON CAREER PAGES
  jQuery(function($) {
    $(document).ready(function(){
      $('.apply-link').click(function() {
        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Careers', 'Apply', document.title.replace(' | Riot Games', '')]);
      });
    });
  });(function() {var ga = document.createElement("script");ga.type = "text/javascript";ga.async = true;ga.src = ("https:" == document.location.protocol ? "https://" : "http://") + "stats.g.doubleclick.net/dc.js";var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);})();
//--><!]]>
</script>

      <div class="term-listing-heading">
<a href="/news" class="back-news-link">Back to News</a>

<h1>Free to play</h1>

		<div class="share-bar">
			<a href="/taxonomy/term/73/feed" class="rss-link">RSS</a>			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>

<article about="/articles/20110113/148/league-legends-scores-free-play-goty-pc-gamer" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-mmccurley odd clearfix" id="node-article-148">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20110113/148/league-legends-scores-free-play-goty-pc-gamer" title="League of Legends Scores Free-to-Play GOTY from PC Gamer">League of Legends Scores Free-to-Play GOTY from PC Gamer</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="League of Legends Scores Free-to-Play GOTY from PC Gamer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><em>League of Legends</em> has taken top honors from <em>PC Gamer</em>, winning their Free-to-Play Game of the Year award.</p> <p>From <em>PC Gamer</em>:</p> <p><em>"2010 saw games lining up around the block for the opportunity to</em>...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20110113/148/league-legends-scores-free-play-goty-pc-gamer" rel="tag" title="League of Legends Scores Free-to-Play GOTY from PC Gamer">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about League of Legends Scores Free-to-Play GOTY from PC Gamer</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>


<article about="/articles/20091007/260/league-legends-here" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-mmccurley even clearfix" id="node-article-260">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20091007/260/league-legends-here" title="League of Legends launches!">League of Legends launches!</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="League of Legends launches!" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><em>League of Legends </em>is live! Featuring 40 playable champions, two unique maps, and 5v5 matchmaking, <em>League of Legends</em> is team-based PVP at its most competitive. Brave the dangers of Summoner's Rift and...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20091007/260/league-legends-here" rel="tag" title="League of Legends launches!">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about League of Legends launches!</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>

e;return!e||"object"!==n&&"function"!==n?-1:e===window?0:a(e,i,function(){return o++})}var o=1,i="nr@id",a=e("gos");n.exports=r},{}],loader:[function(e,n,t){function r(){if(!x++){var e=h.info=NREUM.info,n=d.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];if(setTimeout(s.abort,3e4),!(e&&e.licenseKey&&e.applicationID&&n))return s.abort();c(y,function(n,t){e[n]||(e[n]=t)}),f("mark",["onload",a()+h.offset],null,"api");var t=d.createElement("script");t.src="https://"+e.agent,n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n)}}function o(){"complete"===d.readyState&&i()}function i(){f("mark",["domContent",a()+h.offset],null,"api")}function a(){return E.exists&&performance.now?Math.round(performance.now()):(u=Math.max((new Date).getTime(),u))-h.offset}var u=(new Date).getTime(),f=e("handle"),c=e(2),s=e("ee"),p=window,d=p.document,l="addEventListener",m="attachEvent",w=p.XMLHttpRequest,g=w&&w.prototype;NREUM.o={ST:setTimeout,CT:clearTimeout,XHR:w,REQ:p.Request,EV:p.Event,PR:p.Promise,MO:p.MutationObserver};var v=""+location,y={beacon:"bam.nr-data.net",errorBeacon:"bam.nr-data.net",agent:"js-agent.newrelic.com/nr-1026.min.js"},b=w&&g&&g[l]&&!/CriOS/.test(navigator.userAgent),h=n.exports={offset:u,now:a,origin:v,features:{},xhrWrappable:b};e(1),d[l]?(d[l]("DOMContentLoaded",i,!1),p[l]("load",r,!1)):(d[m]("onreadystatechange",o),p[m]("onload",r)),f("mark",["firstbyte",u],null,"api");var x=0,E=e(4)},{}]},{},["loader"]);</script>

<article about="/articles/20131101/971/rioters-sport-spooky-skins" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sdowney odd clearfix" id="node-article-971">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20131101/971/rioters-sport-spooky-skins" title="Rioters sport spooky skins">Rioters sport spooky skins</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Rioters sport spooky skins" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Is there anything worse than being told you’re being hired for your brains, and then finding out that your zombie boss was being literal? Yeah – a  whole day of meetings notes that look...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20131101/971/rioters-sport-spooky-skins" rel="tag" title="Rioters sport spooky skins">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Rioters sport spooky skins</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>

    </div>

    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150217/546/awards" title="Awards">Awards</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Awards" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p><img alt="" src="/sites/default/files/uploads/RiotAwardsHeader.jpg" style="width: 700px; height: 100px;" /></p> <ul><li> #51 Fortune's 100 Best Workplaces for Millenials - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-millennials/">FORTUNE (2016)</a></li> <li> #14 Fortune's 50 Best Workplaces for Flexibility - <a href="http://fortune.com/best-workplaces-flexibility/"></a></li>...</ul></div></div></div>  </div>

<article about="/articles/20121011/270/league-legends-wins-best-live-game-2012-gdco-awards" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-mmccurley even clearfix" id="node-article-270">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20121011/270/league-legends-wins-best-live-game-2012-gdco-awards" title="League of Legends honored at 2012 GDCO Awards">League of Legends honored at 2012 GDCO Awards</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="League of Legends honored at 2012 GDCO Awards" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Riot Games aspires to be the most player-focused gaming company in world, which makes <a href="http://www.gamasutra.com/view/news/180929/Video_Relive_the_2012_GDC_Online_Choice_Awards.php#.UMPdT4PAfzg" target="_blank">our wins in the Best Community Relations, Best Live Game, and Audience Award categories</a> at GDC Online 2012...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20121011/270/league-legends-wins-best-live-game-2012-gdco-awards" rel="tag" title="League of Legends honored at 2012 GDCO Awards">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about League of Legends honored at 2012 GDCO Awards</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>


<article about="/articles/20101012/150/league-legends-leads-2010-gdc-online-award-winners" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-mmccurley odd clearfix" id="node-article-150">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20101012/150/league-legends-leads-2010-gdc-online-award-winners" title="League of Legends Leads 2010 GDC Online Award Winners">League of Legends Leads 2010 GDC Online Award Winners</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="League of Legends Leads 2010 GDC Online Award Winners" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Riot Games' <em>League of Legends</em> received five awards at the first annual <a href="http://www.gdconlineawards.com/" target="_blank">Game Developers Choice Online Awards</a>, presented at the 2010 GDC Online conference in Austin, Texas.</p> <p>The inaugural event brought together developers of...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20101012/150/league-legends-leads-2010-gdc-online-award-winners" rel="tag" title="League of Legends Leads 2010 GDC Online Award Winners">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about League of Legends Leads 2010 GDC Online Award Winners</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>

    <div class="print-breadcrumb"><a href="/">Home</a> &gt; Riot's making a move</div>

    <div class="print-content">


<article about="/articles/20131107/983/riots-making-move" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-sschutz odd clearfix" id="node-article-983">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title">Riot&#039;s making a move</h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Riot&#039;s making a move" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 11-07-13</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			Print
			<!-- PDF -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/ElementLA.png?itok=laJS1RSw" width="700" height="300" alt="ElementLA" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Over the last year, things have gotten a little too cozy at Riot HQ in Santa Monica. As we&rsquo;ve grown, we&rsquo;ve squeezed ourselves into every cranny and we&rsquo;ve spread across multiple floors and buildings, making communication between teams occasionally tough. But when talk turned to <a href="http://blogs.zappos.com/blogs/inside-zappos/2009/04/01/bunkdesks">bunk desking</a> <span class="print-footnote">[1]</span> as a solution for our space woes, we got serious about looking for a larger, more contiguous space to host us all.</p>
<p>We&rsquo;ve found our next home. Known as <a href="http://elementla.com/">ElementLA</a> <span class="print-footnote">[2]</span>, Riot&rsquo;s new home sits less than a mile east of our current digs &ndash; still just a few klicks from the ocean, but nicely situated next to a soon-to-open metro station that&rsquo;ll be able to whisk Rioters to downtown LA and beyond. We&rsquo;ll move in spring 2015.&nbsp;</p>
<p>We&rsquo;re stoked. The creature comforts will be upgraded: no more lines in the bathrooms, shorter waits at the Starbucks machines, and definitely no more threats of bunk desking. Basically, we&rsquo;re gonna be running short on first-world problems for a while.</p>
<p>More seriously, though, this move represents an investment in Riot&rsquo;s work environment that&rsquo;s consistent with our belief that a fun, comfortable place to work enhances creativity, productivity and communication between teams.</p>
<p>We put a lot of effort into shaping our office environment because we believe that it shapes us and the stuff we develop. Sure, in our early years, Riot managed to launch <em>League of Legends</em> from a space where the ceiling leaked and where &ldquo;conference room 2&rdquo; consisted of a whiteboard propped in a fire escape stairwell. But we&rsquo;ve always admired visionary companies like Pixar and Google who invest in bodaciously productive workspaces. We aren&rsquo;t looking to pile on gold-plated perks, just mercilessly crush space issues to create a playful, comfortable, and collaborative space where we can do our very best work.</p>
<p>So back to today&rsquo;s news. Here are the facts: we&rsquo;ve signed a lease. We&rsquo;re looking to move all Santa Monica Rioters (with room for growth) into the new space in the first half of 2015. We&rsquo;ll post plenty of photos when there&rsquo;s something interesting to look at.&nbsp;</p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/topic/riot-news" typeof="Concept" property="prefLabel">Riot in the News</a> <span class="print-footnote">[3]</span></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/topic/rioter-perks" typeof="Concept" property="prefLabel">Rioter Perks</a> <span class="print-footnote">[4]</span></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/categories/category" typeof="Concept" property="prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a> <span class="print-footnote">[5]</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-tags field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/tags/focus-talent-team" typeof="Concept" property="prefLabel">Focus on talent &amp; team</a> <span class="print-footnote">[6]</span></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-office-location-tag field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-inline clearfix"><div class="field-label">Office Location:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/office-locations/los-angeles" typeof="Concept" property="prefLabel">Los Angeles</a> <span class="print-footnote">[7]</span></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"></nav>
    
		<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/news" class="view-all">All Articles</a> <span class="print-footnote">[8]</span>
      </div>
</article>
</div>
    <div class="print-footer">
</div>
